description:
Anthropic has released Claude 3 Haiku, the fastest and most affordable AI model in its intelligence class. Boasting state-of-the-art vision capabilities and strong performance on industry benchmarks, Haiku is touted as a versatile solution for a wide range of enterprise applications. The model is now available alongside Anthropic’s Sonnet and Opus models in the Claude... Read more »

The post Anthropic says Claude 3 Haiku is the fastest model in its class appeared first on AI News.
title: Anthropic says Claude 3 Haiku is the fastest model in its class
